trans-unit.source: Provides information about an Authenticode signature for a manifest.
trans-unit.target: Fournit des informations à propos d'une signature Authenticode pour un manifeste.

trans-unit.source: Gets the description of the signing certificate.
trans-unit.target: Obtient la description du certificat de signature.

trans-unit.source: The description of the signing certificate.
trans-unit.target: Description du certificat de signature.

trans-unit.source: Gets the description URL of the signing certificate.
trans-unit.target: Obtient l'URL de description du certificat de signature.

trans-unit.source: The description URL of the signing certificate.
trans-unit.target: URL de description du certificat de signature.

trans-unit.source: Gets the hash algorithm used to compute the signature.
trans-unit.target: Obtient l'algorithme de hachage utilisé pour calculer la signature.

trans-unit.source: The hash algorithm used to compute the signature.
trans-unit.target: Algorithme de hachage utilisé pour calculer la signature.

trans-unit.source: Gets the HRESULT value from verifying the signature.
trans-unit.target: Obtient la valeur HRESULT résultant de la vérification de la signature.

trans-unit.source: The HRESULT value from verifying the signature.
trans-unit.target: Valeur HRESULT résultant de la vérification de la signature.

trans-unit.source: Gets the chain of certificates used to verify the Authenticode signature.
trans-unit.target: Obtient la chaîne de certificats utilisée pour vérifier la signature Authenticode.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Chain" /> object that contains the certificate chain.
trans-unit.target: Objet <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Chain" /> qui contient la chaîne de certificats.

trans-unit.source: for the right to enumerate certificates.
trans-unit.target: pour le droit d’énumérer les certificats.

trans-unit.source: Security action: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />.
trans-unit.target: Action de sécurité : <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />.

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.StorePermissionFlags.EnumerateCertificates" />
trans-unit.target: Énumération associée : <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.StorePermissionFlags.EnumerateCertificates" />

trans-unit.source: Gets the certificate that signed the manifest.
trans-unit.target: Obtient le certificat qui a signé le manifeste.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2" /> object that represents the certificate.
trans-unit.target: Objet <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2" /> qui représente le certificat.

trans-unit.source: for the right to enumerate certificates.
trans-unit.target: pour le droit d’énumérer les certificats.

trans-unit.source: Security action: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />.
trans-unit.target: Action de sécurité : <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />.

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.StorePermissionFlags.EnumerateCertificates" />
trans-unit.target: Énumération associée : <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.StorePermissionFlags.EnumerateCertificates" />

trans-unit.source: Gets the time stamp that was applied to the Authenticode signature.
trans-unit.target: Obtient l'horodatage qui a été appliqué à la signature Authenticode.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.TimestampInformation" /> object that contains the signature time stamp.
trans-unit.target: Objet <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.TimestampInformation" /> qui contient l'horodatage de signature.

trans-unit.source: The time stamp is expressed in local time.
trans-unit.target: L’horodatage est exprimée en heure locale.

trans-unit.source: The time stamp is available only if the publisher that signed the time stamp is trusted.
trans-unit.target: L’horodatage est disponible uniquement si le serveur de publication qui a signé l’horodatage est approuvé.

trans-unit.source: Gets the trustworthiness of the Authenticode signature.
trans-unit.target: Obtient la crédibilité de la signature Authenticode.

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.TrustStatus" /> values.
trans-unit.target: Une des valeurs de <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.TrustStatus" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the result of verifying the Authenticode signature.
trans-unit.target: Obtient le résultat de la vérification de la signature Authenticode.

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.SignatureVerificationResult" /> values.
trans-unit.target: Une des valeurs de <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.SignatureVerificationResult" />.

trans-unit.source: A positive verification returns <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.SignatureVerificationResult.Valid>.
trans-unit.target: Une vérification positive retourne <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.SignatureVerificationResult.Valid>.
